summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services (DHHS); modifying allocations of federal funds under the HOME Program for 1996 and 1998; appropriating additional 1998 HOME funds; superseding Exhibit A to Ordinance 118604; authorizing amendments to the City's Consolidated Plans; amending the 1998 Budget of DHHS; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
